Rainy_Day_0: Looks like I won't be doin' much today, haha.$l#$b#You gonna be goin' out @?$0
Rainy_Day_1: I've been meaning to organize the pantry. Maybe today's the day I finally tackle that project.$0#$b#Want to lend a hand?$1
Rainy_Day_2: Found this little thing while tidying up.[72]#$1#$b#Reminded me of you!
Rainy_Day_3: If you decide to head into the caves, don't forget to pack some extra snacks!$0#$b#I know how hungry you get down there!$1
Rainy_Night_0: It gets kinda scary out there at night don'tcha think?$7#$b#You better be careful when you're in the mountains and the woods!$4
Rainy_Night_1: During nights like these, it's comforting being here with you instead of alone in the mountains by myself!$8
Rainy_Night_2: I wonder how the bees are doing out there...$7#$b#I know they can handle it though!$5
Rainy_Night_3: On nights like this, I want to just sit by the fireplace and read a book...$1
Rainy_Night_4: I made us some tea! I thought it'd be nice because of the weather.$9#$b#I hope you like it! [614]$1
Rainy_Night_5: I never realized how comforting the sound of rain tapping on the roof could be.$1
Rainy_Night_Aspen: It's the perfect weather to cuddle! Can we maybe watch a movie tonight, @?$8
Indoor_Day_0: Hey honey! I figured you were wakin' soon, so I made you this! [253]#$0#$b#Now you can take on anything!$1
Indoor_Day_1: Hey, @!$1#$b#You know what they say, "early bird gets the worm!"$1
Indoor_Day_2: If you see Marnie today, tell her I said hi!$1#$b#I should probably visit her myself, but I'll do that another day.$0
Indoor_Day_3: Mornin' @! I can't wait to hear what you do today.$1
Indoor_Day_4: I made you somethin' this mornin'. I hope you like it! [211 201 195 194]#$5
Indoor_Day_Aspen: It's nice to call this farm my home.$0#$b#I always wanted somethin' like this!$1
Indoor_Night_0: I had a good day, today. There's always something interesting goin on around here, if you look close enough.
Indoor_Night_1: I saw some fireflies out by the pond tonight. Reminded me of our first summer here.$1
Indoor_Night_2: Any interesting encounters with the townsfolk today? You always seem to have the most entertaining stories.$0
Indoor_Night_3: I'm getting tired, @. *yawn*$0#$b#I think I'll be going to beed soon.$1
Indoor_Night_4: The sounds of the night are louder out here. I'll never stop enjoying that.
Indoor_Night_Aspen: Are you ready for bed soon? I turned on the electric blanket for us...$l
Outdoor_0: The soft breeze is blowing mountain air throughout the valley today. It smells like fresh pine and sage.
Outdoor_1: Hmm... I think we've got plenty of space for outdoor slime ranching!
Outdoor_2: Make sure to keep things tidy around your Grandpa's shrine. There's something special about it, I can feel it.
Outdoor_3: It's pretty cool that we have a cave on our property. It's something I always dreamed about.$h
Outdoor_4: I always forget to put some snacks in my pocket. *rumble*$h
Outdoor_Aspen: I'm just going to hang out here, okay?#$e#There's a lot of interesting bugs and things out here. *chuckle*$h
funLeave_Aspen: I'm going in to town today, just so you know. I need to stretch these legs a bit.
funReturn_Aspen: Hey! Did you have a good day? Mine went well. It was refreshing to take a walk.$h
OneKid_3: I can't believe I'm a "mom"... life is weird.$h
TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their chocolate cereal. They were screaming!
TwoKids_2: I had a dream that %kid2 will grow up to be a famous monster hunter. I've already been thinking about a little armor set.
TwoKids_3: A cool old house, a couple kids, and an amazing farm. I never thought I'd come this far... but, hey! Our lives are just getting started.$h
Good_1: Did you hear that? Sometimes I'm convinced this house is haunted.$u
Good_2: Welwick's horoscope predicted great things for me today. I feel really motivated!
Good_3: I can't even remember the last time I dyed my hair... I swear, it never fades from this color...
Good_4: I'm glad I owned a heavy pair of boots before moving in. It's hard to imagine tip-toeing around the mud in sneakers.$h
Good_5: I was just admiring the mermaid's pendant you gave me... I'll proudly wear this to my grave.$l
Good_6: Hey. I know you're smart, but I still worry about you sometimes. The world is full of monsters.$6#$e#Just promise me you'll be careful. I don't want to lose you.
Good_7: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for us. I'm really proud of you.$l
Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and shriveled. It's going to happen some day!
Neutral_1: Do you think your Grandpa would be proud of us?
Neutral_6: I wonder how the old shop is doing? I should visit my parents again soon.
Neutral_7: If you moved on to the spirit world, I'd set up a little shrine for you next to Grandpa's.
Neutral_8: No matter how much we clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms are kind of dirty.
Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? I might get bored.
Bad_7: I used to be special to you, your best friend... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.$s
Bad_8: You've been so cold to me lately... What's wrong with you? You're acting like a bog spirit...$s
Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with Sebastian before we met. He was probably the one...$s
spring_1: So, do you have any big plans for the new year?
spring_12: Hey, the egg festival is tomorrow. I'm sorry, but I won't go easy on you because we're married!$h#$e#I plan on winning that egg hunt. Go ahead and try to beat me.
spring_2: Do you have any new year's resolutions? I'm trying to lose a few pounds around the middle.$h
summer_1: I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this time of year.#$e#I hope you like me pale!$h
summer_4: Make sure you don't get a heat stroke, my love.#$e#Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself.
summer_8: Sorry about the smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.
summer_15: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's fun!$h
fall_6: Ah... fall. This might be my favorite time of year. The colors really complement my hair, don't you think?
fall_1: The scent is unmistakable... mushroom, rotting leaves, pumpkin. It's fall, alright. Isn't it lovely?
fall_2: Can we grow giant pumpkins this season? Please, honey?$h
fall_20: Honey... you're worth more to me than a chest full of quartz.#$e#Now, a chest full of amethyst? Hmm... I'd have to think about that one.$h
winter_3: I actually like the cold weather. It just gives me an excuse to get cozy!$h
winter_15: It's fun to explore the valley in winter! Everything is so different under a blanket of snow. And so quiet...
spring_Aspen: I may like the colder seasons, but by the end I'm always glad to see spring arrive.
summer_Aspen: Oh man... I could go for some chocolate cake.
fall_Aspen: Do I smell pumpkin on you? Maybe I'm just dreaming...$h
winter_Aspen: Remember when we played 'Prairie King' together in my room, so long ago? Those were good times.$h
spouseRoom_Aspen: #$1Good morning, @! Got any plans for today?#$0
